name: Dinosaur Battlegrounds
blurb: Experience Prehistoric Earth as a Dinosaur in an accurately recreated 3D world, Fight, Survive and reach the top of the food Chain.

rewards.reward: Minimum Backer Pledge\r\n\r\nOur heartfelt thanks, and a guaranteed spot on our first beta and / or early release.
Access the the beta game a free copy of the interactive E-book on your chosen device. Your name in a Thank you dedication.
Access to the beta,a Free copy of the final  game And E-book your name in the contributors section of the credits. Access to the developers forums.
Two free copies of the final  game And E-book . your name in the contributors section of the credits. A Signed 8X10 print of one of the Dinosaurs. Access to the developers Forums.

All Digital Version\r\nTwo free copies of the final game And E-book . your name in the contributors section of the credits. .Access to the developers Forums. And a Bonus pack of special in game items to be determined t a later date.
Reward add on:\r\nAdd a 3d printed  sculpture of of one of the dinosaur Models to your current pledge

Three free copies of the final  game And E-book. Your name in the top contributors section of the credits. A signed poster of a dinosaur scene. Access to the developers forums. \r\nYou will also get a code that allows you to get access to bonus pack 1, packed full of special limited in game items, we will be announcing the contents of these as we go, they will be packed full of great unique items that you'll be able to find nowhere else.

All Digital Version\r\nThree free copies of the final game And E-book. Your name in the top contributors section of the credits. Access to the developers forums. You will also get a code that allows you to get access to bonus pack 1, packed full of special limited in game items, that you can find nowhere else we will be announcing the contents of these as we go. Also as part of this reward you can opt into our in game GM program and be considered at the top of the list.

Send us your photo and we will create a personalized avatar for you to use in the multiplier game.
We will also send you an image of either you or anyone you like, in a scene with one of the dinosaurs.

The Option to forgo rewards to suggest your own idea for a reward (subject to approval) if its within reason we will grant it, or discuss other options with you.

A chat discussion with a member of the Developer team.

All Previous rewards

Access to the internal Developer boards with ability to make suggestions engage in discussions and decision making process. 

Ten free copies of the final App with game And E-book sections. Your name in the honored contributors section of the credits. 

A LIMITED edition signed poster of a dinosaur scene.

Two Miniature 3d printed sculptures of one of the 3d modeled dinosaurs.

Your choice of one of 5 Rare Special player character dinosaurs to use in the game.

All Previous Rewards.\r\n\r\nTen free copies of the final App with game And E-book sections. Your name in the honored contributors section of the credits. A limited edition signed poster of a dinosaur scene. A selection of   3d printed sculptures of the dinosaurs in full color or in the color of the material type(we will work with you to decide how many and what type of models you want,( higher quality materials are available as well). A special personalized silver pendant honoring your contribution. And a direct line to the creator to offer your suggestions feedback , concerns, and anything else you wish to discuss. The option to visit us and see production first hand, and join in on our development meetings. Se will consider also any other reward you desire so long as its within reason.
All Previous Rewards; Plus a life sized replica of a real dinosaur fossil; Current options are Deinonychus, velociraptor, juvenile protoceratops, and more to come.

All previous rewards

A LIFE SIZE REPLICA OF either a CERATOSAURUS  SKULL or ALLOSAURUS SKULL  The will be Realistic casts of the Actual Fossils
 Or if you prefer get it Sculpted by the Artists of Dinosaur Battlegrounds and possibly an actual fossil copy (material Not yet Decided on, but we are shooting for something light weight and durable).

All Previous Rewards.\r\n\r\nA LIFE SIZE REPLICA OF A TYRANNOSAUR SKULL We are investigating the possibility to make a cast or print a digital copy of the real fossil skull.  (material Not yet Decided on, but we are shooting for something light weight and durable).
